docs.text: Welcome to GarirBari User Manual To login to GarirBari Click Here . Sign-Up Choose your user type - Car owner or Parking Owner Fill the sign up form with proper information. Hit the Sign Up button If encounter any diffulties while signing up, call at 0170322133 . Sign-In Choose your user type - Car owner or Parking Owner Enter the email and password properly. Hit the Sign In button If encounter any diffulties while signing up, call at 0170322133 . Search for Parking Spot (Car Owner) Click the search button. Choose District and Area Hit the Search button If encounter any diffulties while signing up, call at 0170322133 . Add a Parking Spot (Parking Owner) Click the Add Parking Spot button. Fill the form with proper address and information. Hit the Add button If encounter any diffulties while signing up, call at 0170322133 . Edit/Delete a Parking Spot (Parking Owner) Click Your Parking Spots Button. Edit/Change the information. Hit the Done button. Hit the Delete button if you want to delete. If encounter any diffulties while signing up, call at 0170322133 .
docs.title: Welcome to GarirBari User Manual
